description:
Everything you need to replace worn or damaged stove and pump parts on your MSR® XGK Expedition Stove is included in this tidy and durable carrying case. Service kit includes:

  • Control valve o-rings (2)
  • Fuel tube o-rings for standard pumps (2)
  • Fuel bottle o-rings (2)
  • Safety pin (for o-ring removal) (1)
  • Jet and cable tool (1)
  • Pump cup oil (1)
  • Check valve ball (1)
  • Check valve plug (1)
  • Check valve spring (1)
  • Air tube (1)
  • Dip tube (1)
  • XGK flame spreader (1)
  • Fuel tube bushing (1)
  • Shaker needle with cover (1)
  • Pump cup (1)
  • GK jet (1)
  • X jet (1)
  • Jet cleaning wire (1)
  • Set of instructions (1)
name: MSR XGK Expedition Service Kit
